name: Red Bean Stew
author: LauraF
summary: This is a simple Lebanese dish that can be served as a side with pita bread or as a main with rice. It's vegetarian and a snap to put together.
ingredients: 1 bunch fresh cilantro, stems removed and leaves minced
1 (15 ounce) can red beans, drained and rinsed
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Heat oil in a skillet over medium-low heat
Add onions; cook and stir until soft and translucent, about 10 minutes
Stir in cilantro, garlic, cinnamon, coriander, and cumin; cook until fragrant, about 3 minutes
Reduce heat to low; simmer sauce until flavors combine, about 10 minutes
Cover skillet and simmer until beans are heated through, about 10 minutes
Cool to room temperature before serving, about 30 minutes
